perturbation.original_text:
5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising
Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than seven (7)
business days from the Effective Date , which shall be paid to About via wire
transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising
Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than one hundred and twenty (120)
business days from the Effective Date , which shall be paid to About via wire
transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline from seven (7) business days to one hundred and twenty (120) business days from the Effective Date. This creates ambiguity regarding which deadline should be enforced, leading to disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**]
from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application
Fees are to be due within 30 days after the end of the month in which the
Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a
report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the
previous month, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the
number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**]
from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application
Fees are to be due within 15 days after the end of the month in which the
Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a
report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the
previous month, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the
number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline for application fees from 30 days to 15 days after the end of the month. This creates ambiguity regarding which deadline should be enforced, leading to disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates
      as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on
      the overdue amount at the rate of 6% per year,, calculated from 30 days
      after the end of the month for which payment is made until the date of
      ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such
      fees due and owing About. In addition, About shall be entitled to its
      reasonable costs and expenses (including attorneys' fees) in connection
      with any action to collect fees under or to otherwise enforce this
      Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates
      as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on
      the overdue amount at the rate of 12% per year,, calculated from the first day
      after the end of the month for which payment is made until the date of
      ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such
      fees due and owing About. In addition, About shall be entitled to its
      reasonable costs and expenses (including attorneys' fees) in connection
      with any action to collect fees under or to otherwise enforce this
      Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the overdue amount at the rate and calculated from different days. This creates ambiguity regarding which rate and day should be enforced, leading to disputes over contractual obligations.
